revised_title: Observations on the Life-Cycle of a New Flagellate and Remarks on Syngamy in Trypanosomes
tldr: The authors study the life-cycle of a new flagellate, Helkesimastix fæcicola, and its cyst formation process. They also discuss the question of syngamy in trypanosomes, highlighting the role of bacteria in the excystation process.
